Marketing

Our campaigns are tailored to meet our clients unique needs. We work with artists, labels, managers and brands. Our strategy allows our clients to break into new markets effectively with proven increasing penetration and brand awareness.

During your campaign we are able to generate productivity reports using google analytical technology and statistics that give the client - essential marketing elements.

  • Number plays / impressions
  • Insights on key markets to target for possible media tours and bookings
  • Key demographic information useful for future campaign/investments

Our campaigns serve to be cost effective, since the results provide our clients the opportunity to test the market before investing in more costly media outlets (soft launch) - Ultimately, successfully launching our client's product.

Live unplugged session

[gallery columns="4" link="file" size="artwork-large" ids="82895,82897,82896,82898"]

We live in such a fast paced world, It's rare the opportunity for an artist to truly present their vision and to talk about each of their tracks - and even discuss how they came together and what the album means as a whole. Lomaximo Productions is happy to offer this opportunity to artists, in efforts to reach industry insides, bloggers, key tastermakers and their fans in an intimate setting - meanwhile boosting the online and physical sales of the artists songs/albums.

  • State of the art infinity cyclorama cycc wall space
  • Theme set up (seating furniture/props)
  • Professionally Recorded (Audio & Video)
  • 3 Edited Videos (youtube/vimeo)
  • Lighting and sound
  • Social Media posts on our network to promote the event weeks prior
  • Press, Bloggers other invited websites
  • Host for Q&A
  • Streaming on www.lmpradio.com, tunein app, and additional popular blog sites
  • Includes Basic Plan
